You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square. The first and last rows have an "X" in the first and last positions, with three empty squares in between. The second row has "X" in the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions, with an empty square in the third position. The third row has "X" in the first, third, and fifth positions, with empty squares in the second and fourth positions. The fourth and fifth rows have an "X" in the first and last positions, with three empty squares in between.
